## Question 1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds <- diamonds
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price)) + geom_histogram(color = "blue", fill = "white") + facet_wrap(~ cut) + theme_minimal()
```

## Question 2.
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price)) + geom_histogram(color = "blue", fill = "white") + facet_wrap(~ cut) + theme(element_rect(color = "darkred"))
```
